title: Why Cant I Keybind my mouse button 4 & 5 for target champs only
body: Im trying to use my mouse button 5 for target champs only but it wont allow me any ideas or how to fix this

replies.body: Have you recently updated to the Creator Update on Windows 10?  There's currently an issue causing those mouse buttons to no longer function.  We don't have a resolution for this right now, but rolling back should fix it up in the meantime.
umm i do not know if i did update it or not how do i check and how would i roll it back?
